Package server

Class CEMSserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • server.CEMSserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class CEMSserver
extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
    The CEMSserver class is responsible for handling communication between the server and the clients.
